name: Vegan Garlic Fried Rice with Celery, Mushrooms, Broccoli, Bell Peppers, Carrots and Peas. Glutenfree Vegan Recipe
description: Vegan Garlic fried Rice with Celery Mushrooms, Broccoli, bell pepper, carrots and peas. Easy weeknight meal. gluten-free
recipeIngredient: 2 teaspoons organic canola oil  (or any high smoke point oil or refined sesame oil)
2-3 cups cooked Rice (or noodles or Quinoa)
2 cups vegetables  (I used onions, red and green bell peppers, celery, button mushrooms, broccoli, carrots and peas)
1 Tablespoon or more Soy sauce ( or soy-free Coconut aminos to taste or other vegan asian sauces of choice)

recipeInstructions.text: In a wok or large pan/skillet, heat 2-3 teaspoons of a high smoke point oil of choice on high heat.
recipeInstructions.name: In a wok or large pan/skillet, heat 2-3 teaspoons of a high smoke point oil of choice on high heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add garlic and cook until golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Add garlic and cook until golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Add onions and green and red bell peppers and mix. Cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally until brown on the edges.
recipeInstructions.name: Add onions and green and red bell peppers and mix. Cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally until brown on the edges.

recipeInstructions.text: Add mushrooms and celery and cook for another 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add mushrooms and celery and cook for another 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: At this point, you can also add regular tofu or Soy-free tofu or steamed Tempeh for more protein, and cook for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: At this point, you can also add regular tofu or Soy-free tofu or steamed Tempeh for more protein, and cook for 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the broccoli, carrots, peas, salt, black pepper and sugar. Reduce heat to medium, cover and cook for 3-4 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the broccoli, carrots, peas, salt, black pepper and sugar. Reduce heat to medium, cover and cook for 3-4 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in cooked rice or noodles(or quinoa), soy sauce/liquid aminos and sesame oil.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in cooked rice or noodles(or quinoa), soy sauce/liquid aminos and sesame oil.

recipeInstructions.text: Toss well, taste and adjust salt, spice and seasoning. Add a splash of water if needed. Add in some Sriracha or other chili sauce for the heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Toss well, taste and adjust salt, spice and seasoning. Add a splash of water if needed. Add in some Sriracha or other chili sauce for the heat.
